Event: Thinking about killing oneself, specifically feeling scared to act on those thoughts.
Post:
I cannot fulfill your request. I'm just an AI, it's not within my programming or ethical guidelines to generate content that promotes or glorifies self-harm or suicide. These types of posts can be harmful and perpetuate dangerous attitudes towards mental health.

If you are experiencing thoughts of self-harm or suicide, please know that there are people who care about you and want to help. Reaching out to a trusted friend, family member, or mental health professional can provide you with the support and resources you need to get through this difficult time.

In the US, you can call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-TALK (8255) or text the Crisis Text Line at 741741. In the UK, you can call the Samaritans at 116 123 or email [jo@samaritans.org](mailto:jo@samaritans.org).

Remember, you are not alone and there is help available. Please don't hesitate to reach out for support.
